sentence.Network_en: At Burlington I made acquaintance with many principal people of the province.
sentence.Network_cn: 在伯林顿,我认识了该州许多重要人物.

sentence.Network_en: At his house I lay that night, and arrived the next morning at Burlington.
sentence.Network_cn: 我在他家过了一夜, 次日早晨到了柏林顿.

sentence.Network_en: On Monday, Burlington's board of directors convened an in - person meeting to discuss and on the deal.
sentence.Network_cn: 11月2日(本周一), Burlington的董事们召开了一次 面对面 的会议,讨论并表决这笔交易.
